get.description: Returns a preview image based on the requested path and size.

parameters.description: File path of the image to preview
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Preview size ('small' or 'large'). Default is based on server config.
parameters.name: size

get.description: Returns the raw content of a file, multiple files, or a directory. Supports downloading files as archives in various formats.
get.summary: Get raw content of a file, multiple files, or directory

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of specific files within the directory (required)
parameters.name: files

parameters.description: If true, sets 'Content-Disposition' to 'inline'. Otherwise, defaults to 'attachment'.
parameters.name: inline

parameters.description: Compression algorithm for archiving multiple files or directories. Options: 'zip' and 'tar.gz'. Default is 'zip'.
parameters.name: algo

200.description: Raw file or directory content, or archive for multiple files

get.description: Returns metadata and optionally file contents for a specified resource path.

parameters.description: Path to the resource
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Include file content if true
parameters.name: content

parameters.description: Optional checksum validation
parameters.name: checksum

put.description: Updates an existing file at the specified path.

parameters.description: Path to the resource
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

post.description: Creates a new resource or uploads a file at the specified path. Supports file uploads and directory creation.

parameters.description: Path to the resource
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Override existing file if true
parameters.name: override

delete.description: Deletes a resource located at the specified path.

parameters.description: Path to the resource
parameters.name: path

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

patch.description: Moves or renames a resource to a new destination.

parameters.description: Path from resource
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Destination path for the resource
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Action to perform (copy, rename)
parameters.name: action

parameters.description: Overwrite if destination exists
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.description: Rename if destination exists
parameters.name: rename

get.description: Searches for files matching the provided query. Returns file paths and metadata based on the user's session and scope.

parameters.description: Search query
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: path within user scope to search, for example '/first/second' to search within the second directory only
parameters.name: scope

parameters.description: User session ID, add unique value to prevent collisions
parameters.name: SessionId

get.description: Returns the current configuration settings for signup, user directories, rules, frontend, and commands.

put.description: Updates the system configuration settings for signup, user directories, rules, frontend, and commands.

parameters.description: Settings data to update
parameters.name: body

400.description: Bad request - failed to decode body

get.description: Retrieves all share links associated with a specific resource path for the current user.

parameters.description: Resource path for which to retrieve share links
parameters.name: path

200.description: List of share links for the specified path

get.description: Returns a list of share links for the current user, or all links if the user is an admin.

post.description: Creates a new share link with an optional expiration time and password protection.

parameters.description: Share link creation parameters
parameters.name: body

400.description: Bad request - failed to decode body

delete.description: Deletes a share link specified by its hash.

parameters.description: Hash of the share link to delete
parameters.name: hash

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid hash

get.description: Returns the total and used disk space for a specified directory.

parameters.description: Source name for the desired source, default is used if not provided
parameters.name: source

post.description: Adds a new user to the system.

parameters.description: User data to create a new user
parameters.name: data

get.description: Returns a user's details based on their ID.

parameters.description: User ID
parameters.name: id

put.description: Updates the details of a user identified by ID.

parameters.description: User ID
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: User data to update
parameters.name: data

delete.description: Deletes a user identified by their ID.

parameters.description: User ID
parameters.name: id

get.description: Returns the health status of the API.

path.description: path scoped to the associated index

size.description: length in bytes for regular files

type.description: type of the file, either "directory" or a file mimetype

size.description: length in bytes for regular files

type.description: type of the file, either "directory" or a file mimetype

token.description:
Token is a random value that will only be set when PasswordHash is set. It is
URL-Safe and is used to download links in password-protected shares via a
query arg.
